data.title: The Mutant Drums — HEXINVERTER ÉLECTRONIQUE
data.meta_description: The Mutant Drums are a line of powerful analog percussion synthesis modules.
data.meta_site_name: HEXINVERTER ÉLECTRONIQUE | HEXINVERTER.NET | EURORACK MODULAR SYNTHESIZERS
data.text:
Mutant Machine

The most powerful of the Mutant Drums. The Machine is a dynamic analog percussion engine capable of generating many types of drums, from 909-style snares and kicks, to tom-toms, claps, hihats and nearly any other effect you can dream up. It has many alternative purposes when not using it as a drum voice as well.

CLICK FOR PROJECT PAGE

Mutant Hot Glue

The Hot Glue is a powerful analog bus mixer with a simple yet powerful hi-fidelity compressor, and voltage controlled distortion. It features effects send controls for each channel, enhancing live performance usage.

This module lets you design complex effects chains and apply parallel or sidechain compression to your mixes with ease.

CLICK FOR PROJECT PAGE

Mutant Hihats

The Mutant Hihats deliver two highly flexible, classic analog hihats in one convenient package. If you get bored of the internal sound generator, using a different noise source via the EXT in can produce entirely different timbres.

CLICK FOR PROJECT PAGE
